name: Green leggings <retro>
data: It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration strongly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'focus power'.
